discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: Should we also remove or edit the corresponding CHANGELOG entry for now?

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> Should we also remove or edit the corresponding CHANGELOG entry for now?

Let's annotate it, saying it is morally deprecated, but the warning will only come up in the next release and be removed in 1.14.0...

discussion.author: herbelin
discussion.comment: Coming back to this PR, didn't you intend to also change `iota_add`, which is the deprecated constant causing the failure of Coquelicot? Maybe there are more than that to change, I can't tell though.

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
@gares @herbelin The change in this PR should have solved the problem...
Can one of you tell me where to look for the current error message?

discussion.author: herbelin
discussion.comment: Here is a link where to look at: https://gitlab.com/coq/coq/-/jobs/841468976

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: Since `iter_add` is not deprecated anymore, this log is not the one of a build on top of the current master...

discussion.author: herbelin
discussion.comment:
Here is a log of today: https://gitlab.com/coq/coq/-/jobs/843633600

Isn't there a difference between `iota_add` and `iter_add`?

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> Isn't there a difference between `iota_add` and `iter_add`?

Woops, there is, and I have misread and so did the reviewer and assignee of this PR...
